paragraphs: Im tellin ya sir! We gots ta be moor carefull! if the Layawind city watch comes snoopin around agin, we may havta pull anchor and git out of this good fer nuthin city! I aint spendin the rest a my days locked up in no jail for illegaly transportin cattle! No sir, i will not! all due rspect capn, but the mates an me sined on fer real pirate stuff -- murderin lootin and ravagin! we aint no damn shepeards!
